title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 206.2 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 206.2 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part, governing public access to certain records of the
authority, is promulgated solely for the purpose of implementing the provisions
of the Freedom of Information Law. Nothing in this Part shall be deemed to
require the authority to reduce any information to physical form or prepare any
record not possessed or maintained by it, except the records specified in
subdivision 3 of section 87 and subdivision 3 of section
88
of the

Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
206.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
